name: Yokai Mansion (Binus Game Development Club, Jessap, azeloth.lin, makuroo, Youma)
name_original: Yokai Mansion (Binus Game Development Club, Jessap, azeloth.lin, makuroo, Youma)
description:
Welcome to Yokai Mansion : 

Yokai Mansion is a game in which the player adopts the role of youkai hunter. Explore the world of fantasy japanese in the Edo era, where the world is full of youkai terror.

Features :

  • Player has  stamina for parry and dash.

Control : 

MovementW, A, S, DAimMouseAttack & parryLMB (Left Mouse Button)DashRMB (Right Mouse Button)PauseEsc
